header_text: You enjoy strategy games but have recently had more trouble keeping up. At the last game night, you made a silly mistake during your favorite game. Since then, you can't stop obsessing over whether your friends noticed.

elements.Text: Are you able to let go of your anxious thoughts and appreciate the time you had with your friends?

elements.name: You enjoy strategy games but have recently had more trouble keeping up. At the last game night, you made a silly mistake during your favorite game. Since then, you can't stop obsessing over whether your friends noticed._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
